DOC.brief_summary: The aim study design evaluate educational behavioral intervention focus improve nutrition physical activity habit among preschooler Cuenca , Ecuador , overarch goal prevent overweight/obesity promote formation healthy nutrition/physical activity habit .
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Improve Nutrition Physical Activity Preschoolers Cuenca , Ecuador
DOC.detailed_description: In Ecuador city Cuenca , prevalence obesity high ( approximately 22 % population ) . Simultaneously , high prevalence chronic malnutrition ( e.g. , stunt ) . In previous study school-aged child Cuenca , prevalence overweight obese 30 % . The objective study design intervention improve nutrition physical activity habit behavior preschooler . The study begin baseline survey use develop educational behavioral intervention . The intervention consist didactic material teacher , educational material parent , activity child . The investigator carry intervention course school year . The intervention primarily deliver preschool setting , also include workshops parent . The investigator hope study help promote health child Cuenca pilot study test similar intervention large population Ecuador .
DOC.criteria: Any child attend preschool municipality Any child whose parent decline inclusion study
